text:
We built this in january when we starter our marketing agency in Sweden 1/1-2020 from the marketplace as a HubSpot Gold Partner. I had some struggles and some fun. We have some ideas about new icons and how we should use images for our communication because it's a tricky situation trying to distribute and create engagement on content these days (just do-write-document-distribute mentality) :wink: , but otherwise I think it's my 7th website from the marketplace (I'm not a developer) and I have some enterprise customized websites under my belt as well. Mostly enterprise clients, but it's changing. It's all in Swedish  <https://www.ngine.com/>

Merry Christmas to the community :christmas_tree:
